Articles.Content:
Look at the stats at the bottom of the index page:

![5OfqR7M.png](http://i.imgur.com/5OfqR7M.png)

100,000 threads! ..or at least the number of threads that haven't been deleted. (This thread's ID is 112914, so 112,914 - 100,982 = ...11,932 threads deleted/locked?)

Also 1,750,000 posts reached! On our way to 2 million!

:celebrate: :hailprobe:

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-11T17:05:24Z" title="03/11/2015 05:05  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 11, 2015</time> by longbyte1**

Here's another on the way to 2 million.

Congrats, KSP
Yes!!! Yes!!! We made it! Now I need to get rid of one of my threads...
These definitely are my favorite forums out there, just because of how well everyone knows each other! Congrats, Squad!

> 
> These definitely are my favorite forums out there, just because of how well everyone knows each other! Congrats, Squad!

Actually, it's very surprising to me that I rarely see anyone I don't recognize.

Though that's probably because the less common members are just that: less common. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Still, there's a large number of users that I see nearly every day... And yes, congratulations! (We're congratulating a bunch of data on a server... ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif))

> 
> Look at the stats at the bottom of the index page:
> [http://i.imgur.com/5OfqR7M.png](http://i.imgur.com/5OfqR7M.png)
> 
> 100,000 threads! ..or at least the number of threads that haven't been deleted. (This thread's ID is 112914, so 112,914 - 100,982 = ...11,932 threads deleted/locked?)
> 
> Also 1,750,000 posts reached! On our way to 2 million!
> 
> :celebrate: :hailprobe:

I think that might be closer to 10,000 posts in the International Forums and about two thousand locked/deleted, as if I recall correctly posts in the International forum are not counted in the little counter down there.
I believe this calls for a good beer....
